meanings.sent1: The farmer's boots were so dungy after working in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The old shed had a dungy smell from the nearby barn.
meanings.sent3: The dungy shoes made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The dungy walls of the cave told stories of ancient creatures.
meanings.sent5: The dungy appearance of the mud made it hard to distinguish from actual dung.

meanings.definition: Covered in or smelling of dung.
meanings.sent1: The dungy dog rolled happily in the fresh grass.
meanings.sent2: The dungy path led to the pigpen at the farm.
meanings.sent3: The dungy pig caused a commotion at the county fair.
meanings.sent4: The dungy air in the stable made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The dungy scent lingered in the room long after the cows had left.
